entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.

text: I have convened a special President’s Coordinating Council meeting this morning to discuss progress & challenges on implementation of the national & provincial responses to #COVID19, the lockdown & our economic recovery plan. Attending is the DP, Ministers, 9 Premiers & SALGA. https://t.co/fx69Iml3eU
